title: Weather and Landscape Illustration
description: An illustrated landscape showing various weather conditions. On the left, there are dark clouds with rain and snow falling on a mountainous area. A river flows down from the mountains into a lush green area. On the right, there is a sunny sky with a bright sun and lighter clouds, indicating a clear weather condition over the ocean.

title: Burnt Forest
description: A landscape depicting a forest with charred, blackened trees standing against a bright blue sky with scattered clouds. The ground appears barren, with remnants of vegetation, illustrating the aftermath of a wildfire.
